# Random Variable Regression App

### Application

This application provides a graphical output of a simple linear regression between 2 correlated variables. The graphical output provides a display of the data points, the liner regression line and a smoother.

### Accessing the application

The link to the application is:

https://pjlavis.shinyapps.io/DataProducts

### Inputs

The application accepts:

1. Number of simulated data points. A range of 10 to 5000
2. The correlation of the data. A range of -1 to 1
